MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 07:50AM in the WA4, CW8 and CW9 postcode area of Northwich and Warrington following reports of a low overhead cable. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely possible by 10AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 07:51AM on 31st October 2020
